column3: Total No. of Cases for Trial including Pending Cases (Col.3)
column5: No. of Cases - Compounded or Withdrawn (Col.5)
column6: No. of Cases in which Trials were Completed - Convicted (Col.6)
column7: No. of Cases in which Trials were Completed - Acquitted or Discharged (Col.7)
column8: No. of Cases in which Trials were Completed - Total (Col.8) = Col.{(6)+ (7)}

column2: Protection of Civil Rights Act - Total

Protection of Civil Rights Act - (ii) PCR Act for STs
